department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Provision and delivery of Meat, Poultry and Fish Products
full_summary:
##Title: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) - Meat, Poultry, and Fish Products ##

###Project Information:###


*   Project Title: RFSO-Meat, Poultry and Fish Products
*   Solicitation Number: WS4157019857
*   Publication Date: August 22, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: October 10, 2023, 14:00 EDT
*   Expected Contract Start Date: December 1, 2023

###Scope of Work:###

This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) invites interested suppliers to provide electronic quotes for geographically zone-based Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of Meat, Poultry, and Fish Products on an as-and-when-requested basis.

###Regions of Opportunity:###

The Ontario Region has been divided into six (6) zones:

*   Southern Ontario (1)
*   Central Ontario (2)
*   North Western Ontario (3)
*   North Eastern Ontario (4)
*   National Capital Region (5)
*   Eastern Ontario (6)

###Trade Agreements:###

This RFSA is open to bidders under various trade agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

###Method of Procurement:###

The procurement method for this RFSO is Competitive - Open Bidding.

###Evaluation Criteria:###

Bids will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price.

###Supply and Delivery:###

The successful supplier shall ensure timely and compliant supply and delivery of Meat, Poultry, and Fish Products to authorized users on an as-and-when-requested basis.

###Request for Bids:###

To be considered for this RFSO, respondents must submit their bids electronically to Ariba Discovery at [https://discovery.ariba.com/r
